title: Bug 109718 - Text item shows content in one line instead of expected format
description: When a large content is inserted in a text item, the tips that appear when hovering over the text item should display the content in the expected format. However, the tips are currently shown in one line instead of the expected format.
OB: When hovering over the text item with large content, the tips are shown in one line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format, with appropriate line breaks.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Insert a text item in the layout. 2. Enter the following content in the text item: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE.NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'. 3. Save the layout. 4. Put the mouse cursor on the text item to view the tips.
